name: Mohtashim Siddiqui
bio: Former Team Mentor of Team Envision. Played a crucial role in team strategy and competition prep. Currently working at Engro as a Mechanical Design Engineer.

name: Taha Mehmood
bio: Ex-Team Manager. Specialized in EV systems management. Led project management and logistics during Shell Eco-marathon 2025. Currently employed at Engro.

name: Rayyan Dawood
bio: Team Lead for Yasoob and Doc Hudson projects. Expert in lightweight chassis design. Currently working as an engineer at Engro.

bio: Team Lead. Expert in vehicle aerodynamics and lightweight chassis design. Currently working as an engineer at Shell.
